Articles.Content: I was trying to get open gl mode to work on my ksp but I keep getting errors. I normaly use the resaultion of 1440 X 900 and when I tried open GL it gave me a error saying my resaultion was invalid. I tried lowering it but no matter how much I lower it it still gives me the same error. Anyone know how I can fix this?

What graphics card do you have?

Take screen shot of error message and an the first 20 lines of the error log if there is one

I appreaite the reply sorry it took me so long to reply, was a very busy week. I use the Nvidia Geforce gtx 760. It's working fine and it's updated regulary. The error messages is

Switching to resolution 1440x900 failed, trying lower one

All resolution switches have failed

Screen: could not switch resolution (1440x900 fs=0 hz=0)

- - - Updated - - -

and it does not produce a error log the game doesn't get that far

Moved to Support (modded installs) where the right people may see this.

It sounds like OpenGL isn't able to use true fullscreen on your system. This has been a common issue since KSP 0.90, though it's a Unity issue, so there's nothing the KSP devs can do about it.

Try using both -force-opengl and -nopopup as suggested in this thread.
